Study Title: Study of the Safety, Tolerability and Efficacy of BTX 1204 in Patients With Moderate Atopic Dermatitis
Brief Summary: This is a randomized, double-blind, vehicle-controlled, Phase 2 study in subjects with moderate AD.
Primary Outcome Measures: Investigator's Global Assessment (IGA), Investigator's Global Assessment (IGA) success defined as an IGA score of "Clear" (0) or "Almost Clear" (1) with at least a 2-grade improvement, Day 85
Study Design: Allocation: RANDOMIZED|Intervention Model: PARALLEL|Masking: QUADRUPLE (PARTICIPANT, CARE_PROVIDER, INVESTIGATOR, OUTCOMES_ASSESSOR)|Primary Purpose: TREATMENT
